definition[0]: someone who wears funny clothes, a red nose, bright make-up on their face etc, and does silly things to make people laugh, especially at a circus
definition[1]: someone who often makes jokes or behaves in a funny way
note[0]: class clown (=someone in a school class who behaves in a funny or silly way)
example[0]: Frankie’s a bit of a clown.
example[1]: I can’t understand what she sees in that clown.
definition[3]: to behave in a silly or funny way
